localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. ⠀ It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when you’re free so you can think, feel and perform better.
blogPost.body: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. ⠀ It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when you’re free so you can think, feel and perform better.
blogPost.title: WellBuddy - Helping you find time to focus on your wellbeing at work
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: WellBuddy是一款智能健康工具，让您在工作中轻松简单地关注健康。⠀ 它与您的日历集成，并在您空闲时监控和安排身体和心理健康休息时间，以便您可以更好地思考、感受和执行。
localize.tagline: 帮助您找到时间专注于工作中的健康。

localize.description: WellBuddy是一款智能健康工具，讓您在工作中輕鬆簡單地關注健康。⠀ 它與您的日曆集成，並在您空閒時監控和安排身體和心理健康休息時間，以便您可以更好地思考、感受和執行。
localize.tagline: 幫助您找到時間專注於工作中的健康。

previous.excerpt: Planning a Clubhouse meetup soon? Then you need to invite to your room as many people as possible. Let’s do it via social media: Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. Put your content on the main artboard and get cards for all three platforms at once.
previous.title: Clubhouse Cards - Announce your next meetup to as many people as possible

localize.description: 计划近期举行会所聚会？那么你需要邀请尽可能多的人到你的房间。让我们通过社交媒体来进行。Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. 把你的内容放在主图板上，一次获得三个平台的卡片。
localize.tagline: 向尽可能多的人宣布你的下一次见面会。

localize.description: 計劃近期舉行會所聚會？那麼你需要邀請儘可能多的人到你的房間。讓我們通過社交媒體來進行。Twitter, Telegram, and Instagram. 把你的內容放在主圖板上，一次獲得三個平臺的卡片。
localize.tagline: 向儘可能多的人宣佈你的下一次見面會。
